short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy the crafting recipe's json to the clipboard on crafting.thedestruc7i0n.ca

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes it way easier to make minecraft datapacks with custom crafting recipes by making it so you can easily copy the JSON on crafting.thedestruc7i0n.ca to your clipboard for easy pasting.
